name: Infectious
entries: At 5th level, you can spread your Virus to the dead. If a humanoid creature would die to a spell infected by your Virus or damage dealt by your Virus, you can use your Reaction to spread the virus to their body. They arise as a Zombie under your control in 1d4+1 rounds. You can have a number of Zombies equal to your proficiency bonus under your control at one time from this feature.
